create.label: Create a new API Key
create.description: Define a label and the scopes you want to grant to this API Key.
create.success: Your API Key has been created. Copy it now, you won't be able to see it again.

errors.tooFarInFuture: This date is too far in the future.
errors.inPast: Expiration date must be in the future.

emptyState.title: Welcome to your API Keys
emptyState.description: Create an API Key to get started with the API.

delete.label: Delete API Key
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this API Key? Your existing integrations using this API Key will stop working. You can create a new API Key to replace it.
